alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 05 at 2:33PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following county, Webb. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 233 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Sombrerito Creek, Cuervo Creek, Chacon Creek and Grande, Rio. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Laredo International Airport, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Texas A&M, St Augustine High School South Laredo, Laredo Community College and Orvil. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
